00086 //Logging
00087 void LogErrorFn  (const char* fileName, int lineNumber, const char* msg, ...);
00088 void LogInvalidParameterFn  (const char* fileName, int lineNumber, const char* msg, ...);
00089 void LogWarningFn(const char* fileName, int lineNumber, const char* msg, ...);
00090 void LogInfoFn   (const char* fileName, int lineNumber, const char* msg, ...);
00092 #define NV_CLOTH_LOG_ERROR(...) nv::cloth::LogErrorFn(__FILE__,__LINE__,__VA_ARGS__)
00093 #define NV_CLOTH_LOG_INVALID_PARAMETER(...) nv::cloth::LogInvalidParameterFn(__FILE__,__LINE__,__VA_ARGS__)
00094 #define NV_CLOTH_LOG_WARNING(...) nv::cloth::LogWarningFn(__FILE__,__LINE__,__VA_ARGS__)
00095 #define NV_CLOTH_LOG_INFO(...) nv::cloth::LogInfoFn(__FILE__,__LINE__,__VA_ARGS__)
00096 
00097 //ASSERT
00098 NV_CLOTH_API(physx::PxAssertHandler*) GetNvClothAssertHandler(); //This function needs to be exposed to properly inline asserts outside this dll
00099 #if !PX_ENABLE_ASSERTS
00100 #if PX_VC
00101 #define NV_CLOTH_ASSERT(exp) __noop
00102 #else
00103 #define NV_CLOTH_ASSERT(exp) ((void)0)
00104 #endif
00105 #else
00106 #define NV_CLOTH_ASSERT(exp)                                                                                           \
00107     {                                                                                                                  \
00108         static bool _ignore = false;                                                                                   \
00109         (static_cast<void>((!!(exp)) || (!_ignore && ((*nv::cloth::GetNvClothAssertHandler())(#exp, __FILE__, __LINE__, _ignore), false))));    \
00110         PX_CODE_ANALYSIS_ASSUME(exp);                                                                                  \
00111     }
00112 #endif
00113 
00114 //Profiler
00115 physx::PxProfilerCallback* GetNvClothProfiler(); //Only use internally
00116 #if PX_DEBUG || PX_CHECKED || PX_PROFILE || 1
00117 class NvClothProfileScoped
00118 {
00119   public:
00120     PX_FORCE_INLINE NvClothProfileScoped(const char* eventName, bool detached, uint64_t contextId,
00121                                     const char* fileName, int lineno, physx::PxProfilerCallback* callback)
00122     : mCallback(callback)
00123     {
00124         PX_UNUSED(fileName);
00125         PX_UNUSED(lineno);
00126         mProfilerData = NULL; //nullptr doesn't work here on mac
00127         if (mCallback)
00128         {
00129             mEventName = eventName;
00130             mDetached = detached;
00131             mContextId = contextId;
00132             mProfilerData = mCallback->zoneStart(mEventName, mDetached, mContextId);
00133         }
00134     }
00135     ~NvClothProfileScoped(void)
00136     {
00137         if (mCallback)
00138         {
00139             mCallback->zoneEnd(mProfilerData, mEventName, mDetached, mContextId);
00140         }
00141     }
00142     physx::PxProfilerCallback* mCallback;
00143     const char* mEventName;
00144     bool mDetached;
00145     uint64_t mContextId;
00146     void* mProfilerData;
00147 };
00148 
00149 #define NV_CLOTH_PROFILE_ZONE(x, y)                                                                                          \
00150     nv::cloth::NvClothProfileScoped PX_CONCAT(_scoped, __LINE__)(x, false, y, __FILE__, __LINE__, nv::cloth::GetNvClothProfiler())
00151 #define NV_CLOTH_PROFILE_START_CROSSTHREAD(x, y)                                                                             \
00152     (GetNvClothProfiler()!=nullptr?                                                                                        \
00153     GetNvClothProfiler()->zoneStart(x, true, y):nullptr)
00154 #define NV_CLOTH_PROFILE_STOP_CROSSTHREAD(profilerData, x, y)                                                                              \
00155     if (GetNvClothProfiler())                                                                                           \
00156     GetNvClothProfiler()->zoneEnd(profilerData, x, true, y)
00157 #else
00158 
00159 #define NV_CLOTH_PROFILE_ZONE(x, y)
00160 #define NV_CLOTH_PROFILE_START_CROSSTHREAD(x, y) nullptr
00161 #define NV_CLOTH_PROFILE_STOP_CROSSTHREAD(profilerData, x, y)
00162 
00163 #endif
00164 
00165 }
00166 }
